#include<iostream>
#define MAX 101
using namespace std;
typedef long long int INT;
int main()
{
    INT t,i,arr[MAX];
    while(cin>>t)
    {
        INT sum=0;
        for(i=0;i<t;i++)
        {
            cin>>arr[i];
            sum+=arr[i];
        }
        for(i=t-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
        cout<<endl<<sum<<endl;
    }
 return 0;
}
